Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Conference Room', 2: 'Babylonia'}
{3: 'Babylonia, Conference Room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'And that concludes the data report transmitted back by Chrome.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront39.png', 4: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory622.jpg', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The screen freezes on a pool of thick, crimson liquid, its surface twisting—the original form now barely recognizable.'}
{3: 'Fragmented metallic limbs of fallen Constructs protrude from the morass, clotted with malformed chunks of flesh...'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory622.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0.5', 5: '1.5'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_28.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{3: 'And faces.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Amid the undulating mass, several disturbingly serene faces rise to the surface.'}
{3: 'Rargh... Squeak... Rargh...'}
{3: 'They murmur in indistinct whispers, their voices weaving a haunting, almost cheerful melody beyond comprehension.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'At the end of the report, the Gray Raven Commandant left a message, saying that they were about to head to the lower second level of the aquarium.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Celica', 3: 'The Punishing Virus concentration is higher there, so they were concerned about potential delays in transmitting future reports. As a precaution, they relayed this information ahead of time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "The Science Council's takeaway is that... the Red Tide is mutating.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1601_7.jpg'}
{3: 'From Corrupted to the Red Tide.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1280.jpg'}
{3: 'From the Red Tide to those...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{3: 'She deliberates for a long moment, unable to find more suitable words to describe that grotesque mass of flesh.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Those "Hetero-Creatures" in the Red Tide... If they were not illusions created by the Ascendants, then...', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Then what the Gray Raven Commandant saw in the vision—that "Lithos is accelerating the evolution of Hetero-Creatures through the Red Tide"—would be an established fact.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The projected screen displays a series of images, clearly illustrating this fact.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "We've got to put a stop to this. Those Omega Weapons...", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'No, that\'s not going to cut it. These are just "predictions," and they won\'t be enough to get Parliament to sign off on using the Omega Weapons we salvaged from the moon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Right now, the moon is the only place where we can even make Omega Weapons. For a lot of people, these weapons mean their best hope of taking back Earth.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He can practically hear the arguments now:'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory427.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory427.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: '"Producing Omega Weapons requires zero-point energy. Right now, the only place in our controlled territories with zero-point reactors is the lunar base."'}
{3: '"We can\'t throw away our long-term future for a quick win."'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}

{3: "The mere fact that the Purifying Force Captain and Vice-Captain are lost to the aquarium won't be enough to sway those councilors. Even the Red Tide Influx alone won't make them abandon their hopes for the zero-point reactors."}
{3: 'Unless...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2301_5.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading36.png'}
{3: 'Unless a greater threat emerges—something that puts the surface itself at risk, threatens Babylonia, and puts... their "interests" on the line.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Celica, mark the Red Tide Influx's entry point. Based on its spread rate, pinpoint all nearby conservation areas that'll be impacted.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "President, once the Red Tide spreads, it'll impact a total of 13 conservation areas and multiple plantations in the surrounding areas... Here's all of them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Hah. Just like you to do that.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Well, everyone's got something they care about.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Speaking of which... how's the lunar base inspection shaping up?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "15.21% done. Hauling the engineering gear takes ages. It'll be at least another four or five days till it's wrapped up.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The meeting room goes absolutely quiet. A faint sound comes from outside the door—it's Asimov."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "President Hassen, Commander Nikola, we've processed the data report you just sent over. The analytical and simulation results are ready.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'And the conclusion?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Our findings confirm that the Ascendants are mass-breeding the Red Tide under the aquarium. The Punishing Virus in the Red Tide is already showing signs of mutation.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I advise immediate intervention. Otherwise, the Red Tide Influx will trigger widespread Hetero-Creature spawning, placing all coastal surface strongholds at risk of total collapse.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: '...So, if the Omega Weapons are a no-go, is there any chance we could use the Longinus Arsenal?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'm afraid not.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The Longinus Arsenal can only hit the Red Tide on the surface. The Red Tide in the aquarium is three floors down, underground.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'By the time it even gets close to the underground Red Tide, the Longinus Arsenal would lose 60% of its punch, making any direct impact impossible...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Mid-conversation, Asimov's terminal chimes abruptly."}
{3: 'He silences it with a frown, but seconds later, the sharp ringtone pierces the quiet again.'}
{3: "Nikola gives him a look, and Asimov, clearly annoyed, answers the call. A pale woman's face pops up on the screen."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory648.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'None of your business, Vesalius.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'None of my business?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "Asimov, that frame was Kurono's solo project, just loaned to Babylonia as a courtesy. I've got every right to know where she is.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "She's on a classified mission; the details are under wraps...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "...Spare me the bureaucratic evasion, Commander Nikola. Kurono handed over the Stigmata frame to the military for free. As its creator, I'm entitled to answers.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "Stigmata's last transmitted M.I.N.D. data was a mess, full of interference. The frame might already be rife with the Punishing Virus.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "She was never the primary compatible user to begin with. Keep this up, and without a commandant to stabilize her M.I.N.D.? That frame's gonna be scrap at the bottom of the sea.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: 'What about the Phantom Tracer?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Equipping the Phantom Tracer would cause severe deviation in Bianca's M.I.N.D., and its operational performance is far from ideal.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "That's Stigmata's own lookout, not the Phantom Tracer's fault.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "Can't accept herself, can't even accept what she's become... Pathetic.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "It's no wonder she's frying her own M.I.N.D. in that frame with that attitude.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The pale woman's lips curl into a mocking smile."}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "...Whatever. Do what you want with the Hetero-Hive Mother's tissue in the Phantom Tracer, but you'd better find a way to drag Stigmata back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "Or trust me, you really won't like seeing the bill for her frame development.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "That's not your concern.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vesalius', 3: "It better be. I'd hate to see my life's work just become disposable junk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With those cold words, Vesalius simply vanishes from the projection.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "Bianca's frame...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "The situation is undeniably dire. The Science Council has just received Stigmata's latest M.I.N.D. synchronization data...", 4: '1'}
{3: "The terminal's screen glows with stark red data streams."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Bianca is exhibiting severe M.I.N.D. deviation. And we've had no mission updates for far too long.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Given their current progress, they should be on the lower second or third level by now. The high concentration of Punishing there is probably messing with their comms.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Bianca... if I remember right, the Science Council's been working on a new frame customized just for her?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Yeah, though progress has been consistently slow.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov sighs faintly at the mention of it.'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The Science Council isn't just looking to churn out another frame that can only lug around the Omega Weapon. We've been trying to build this frame's capabilities from a completely different angle.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "I remember this frame's core ability is... purification?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Given the current circumstances... "compression" would be a more accurate term than purification.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Take the Phantom Tracer, for instance—its primary function is data acquisition on the Punishing Virus. By scrambling the viral information structures, this frame can essentially "thin out" its concentration.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'It\'s like dropping ink into a stream—it doesn\'t truly "purify" them in any real sense.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "...Can the Hetero-Hive Mother's tissue brought back from Kurono be put to use?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'It can be.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'After getting my hands on the tissue, I managed to simulate a "Phantom Tracer reversal" effect using external equipment. It\'s enough to sustain this frame\'s combat operations—but only for a limited time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "At maximum, we're looking at five hours of runtime. After that, the frame's energy depletes, and the system will force a shutdown.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '...That should be enough for now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Worst-case scenario, we might have to roll out this frame sooner than planned.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Alright. I'll make sure this frame is deployed with the team transporting the Omega Weapons. Asimov, could you handle the prep work for its deployment?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'No problem.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hassen and Nikola stay behind, still trying to get Parliament on board with using the Omega Weapons. Asimov, meanwhile, turns and exits the meeting room.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bianca's... new frame."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{3: 'Back at the Science Council, Asimov breezes past multiple layers of security until he reaches the classified laboratory.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before the frame storage chamber, he stands motionless, his eyes fixed on the scrolling data of a virtual screen beside him. His mind races.'}

{3: "The Phantom Tracer can extract information from the Punishing Virus—but this capability isn't solely due to Kurono's technology. The true source is the Hetero-Hive Mother's tissue embedded within it. Thanks to Commander Nikola's arrangements, this invaluable specimen now resides securely within the Science Council."}
{3: 'Its potential should far exceed mere "decrypting" or "compressing" the information carried within Punishing.'}
{3: "It's as if a locked door looms before him, intangible yet undeniable. All he needs now... is the key."}
{3: 'A key that can really "dissect" the very essence of the Punishing Virus.'}
